transportAdvice: Marseille has a metro, tram, and bus network that connects the city centre and major tourist areas reasonably well, though some coastal and hillside neighbourhoods are best reached by bus or taxi. The Vieux-Port area and central districts are walkable, but the city's hilly terrain and spread-out layout make public transit or taxis useful for longer journeys.
